thread.title: 4-star basketball recruit Josh Hall commits to Nevada
thread.title_full: 4-star basketball recruit Josh Hall commits to Nevada

title: 4-star basketball recruit Josh Hall commits to Nevada
text: Share Updated: 10/15 8:58 pm RENO, Nev. (MyNews4.com & KRNV) -- Top 100 recruit J osh Hall, a 6 foot, 7 inch shooting guard, who attends Genesis Academy in Lynchburg, Virginia announced on Twitter that he has verbally committed to the Nevada basketball program. Hall picked the Silver and Blue over Wake Forest, Georgia Southern, George Mason and a handful of other schools. Hear why Hall thinks Nevada is the best fit for him in the attached video. I will be furthering my education and basketball career at the University of Nevada!! #GoPack üê∫üê∫
